title: マイルCSの後に・嬉しみがエグい

text_block_list.text: Matikanetannhauser has achieved a splendid victory over Daitaku Helios! The two promise to fight together again.
On the way home, Daitaku Helios invites her to the 'Helios Cheer Festival,' among other things—
And so, the 'Mile Championship' came to a close.
